titleInfo.title: Jeune fille du Liban en costume de féte

mods.abstract: Young woman at a photography studio with dark wavy hair wearing an Egyptian/Bedouin costume and jewelry with a jug on her right knee and her left arm upon a rock formation; forest backdrop (background); "685_ Jeune fille du Liban en costumes de fête Bonfils" in white along bottom of print.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture
